title: What are some good 1-5 word poetry prompts and writing prompts? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I understand the question correctly, you would like writing prompts in which the suggested sentence has a maximum of 5 words. Here goes: Explain why words hurt people.Write about an annoying habit.Write a poem about cats.Write about your left foot.Write about your phone.Share your feelings about driving.Write about walking.Describe a moving object.Write about coughing.Write about sneezing.Write about your mother.In 5 words, express sorrow.In two words, express love.Write about your personal truth.Write about lying.In 5 words, describe Quora.Teach me how to breathe.Make up a new world.Why do you cook dinner?Why don’t you cook dinner?What is therapy?Those are off the top of my head. I hope this is helpful.
